channel.title: How do I change color and bonuses of weapons?
channel.description: Like say i start with abyssal whip, how do i make it partially red and change the bonuses? like dragon whip on some servers

item.title: How do I change color and bonuses of weapons?
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

You will need a client to make the whip a bit red.
And with the bonuses, that will be in item.cfg. The last numbers to the right of the item ID and name and the Examine message.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change color and bonuses of weapons?
